special_text:
[-1]: Create a red and green Subroutine enchantment token named SAVE() with “Whenever this Subroutine runs, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.”
[-1]: You may sacrifice an enchantment. If you do, search your library for an enchantment card with mana value equal to one plus the sacrificed enchantment's mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
notes:
!tokens SAVE() ERR;Program A ERR;Program B ERR;Program C ERR

art3
You may sacrifice an enchantment. If you do, search your library for an enchantment card with mana value equal to one plus the sacrificed enchantment's mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

look at the top seven cards of your library. Then you may sacrifice an enchantment. If you do, you may put a creature card with mana value X or less from among those cards onto the battlefield, where X is 1 plus the sacrificed enchantment's mana value. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flagged (build-around)
